input.sentences: i 'm [male] | this is a typical day at work .
every day | we watch our boss get driven in by some limo .
this is us pretending this is the boss | we are making him drink !
ok | down to work got ta make sure all these wires go right or we 're in big trouble .
this is us | we are happy with our boss today because he bought us a new toy .
output.sentences: The tech CEO is ready to leave work.
His limo pulls up to carry him home.
He had a rough day, so he pours himself a drink.
Meanwhile, his flunky is confused about the network cables.
Both the CEO and his flunky are fired and replaced by a new CEO and flunky.
